name: Bryan Johnson Blueprint Protocol
description: Comprehensive anti-aging protocol by tech entrepreneur Bryan Johnson, aiming to achieve the body of an 18-year-old. Involves 100+ supplements, strict diet (1,977 calories vegan), extensive exercise, precise sleep optimization, and regular biomarker testing. Reported biological age reversal of 5+ years.

dosage.notes: Full protocol costs $2M+/year. Core elements (diet, sleep, exercise, key supplements) achievable for much less. Published openly at blueprint.bryanjohnson.com.
